alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Middlesex; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Mercer, south central Somerset and west central Middlesex Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rocky Hill, or 11 miles southwest of New Brunswick, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Brunswick, Princeton, Rocky Hill, Kingston, Kendall Park, Dayton, Princeton North, Monmouth Junction and Heathcote. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
